mapper.sql: select * from ( select temp.* from sys_role temp ) t
mapper.select: select sp.* from sys_role sr left join sys_role_user sru on(sr.id = sru.role_id) left join sys_user su on(su.id = sru.user_id) left join sys_role_permission srp on(srp.role_id = sr.id) left join sys_permission sp on(sp.id = srp.permission_id ) where su.account = #{account}
